Name: TAMERLANE
About the game: Tamerlane has a linear story and a rogue like arena mode, offering long and engaging gameplay. Although there are a good number of attacks, items and upgrades to choose from and grow stronger the primary focus of the game is the right movement to avoid the different enemies you will encounter while dealing as much damage as you can. Make your way through 45 stages in 3 regions defeat bosses and solve puzzles.
